h4401.definition: from the same as {{h4397}}; ministrative; Malaki, a prophet; Malachi.

h4402.definition: from {{h4390}}; fulness, i.e. (concretely) a plump socket (of the eye); × fitly.

h4403.definition: or מַלְבֻּשׁ; from {{h3847}}; a garment, or (collectively) clothing; apparel, raiment, vestment.

h4405.definition: from {{h4448}} (plural masculine as if from מִלֶּה; a word; collectively, a discourse; figuratively, a topic; answer, by-word, matter, any thing (what) to say, to speak(-ing), speak, talking, word.

h4406.definition: (Aramaic) corresponding to {{h4405}}; a word, command, discourse, or subject; commandment, matter, thing. word.

h4407.definition: or מִלֹּא; (2 Kings 12:20), from {{h4390}}; a rampart (as filled in), i.e. the citadel; Millo. See also {{h1037}}.

h4409.definition: or מַלּוּכִי; (Nehemiah 12:14), from {{h4427}}; regnant; Malluk, the name of five Israelites; Malluch, Melichu (from the margin).

h4410.definition: feminine passive participle of {{h4427}}; something ruled, i.e. a realm; kingsom, king's, × royal.

h4411.definition: from {{h3885}}; a lodgment, i.e. caravanserai or encampment; inn, place where...lodge, lodging (place).

h4412.definition: feminine from {{h3885}}; a hut, a hammock; cottage, lodge.

h4413.definition: apparently from {{h4448}}; I have talked (i.e. loquacious); Mallothi, an Israelite; Mallothi.

h4414.definition: a primitive root; also as denominative from {{h4417}}; properly, to rub to pieces or pulverize; intransitively, to disappear as dust; also to salt whether internally (to season with salt) or externally (to rub with salt); × at all, salt, season, temper together, vanish away.

h4415.definition: (Aramaic) corresponding to {{h4414}}; to eat salt, i.e. (generally) subsist; have maintenance.

h4417.definition: from {{h4414}}; properly, powder, i.e. (specifically) salt (as easily pulverized and dissolved); salt(-pit).

h4418.definition: from {{h4414}} in its original sense; a rag or old garment; rotten rag.

h4419.definition: from {{h4414}} in its second. sense; a sailor (as following 'the salt'); mariner.

h4420.definition: from {{h4414}} (in its denominative sense); understood as land ({{h776}}); properly, salted (i.e. land), i.e. a desert; barren land(-ness), salt (land).

h4421.definition: from {{h3898}} (in the sense of fighting); a battle (i.e. the engagement); generally, war (i.e. war-fare); battle, fight(-ing), war(-rior).

h4422.definition: a primitive root; properly, to be smooth, i.e. (by implication) to escape (as if by slipperiness); causatively, to release or rescue; specifically, to bring forth young, emit sparks; deliver (self), escape, lay, leap out, let alone, let go, preserve, save, × speedily, × surely.

h4423.definition: from {{h4422}},; cement (from its plastic smoothness); clay.

h4424.definition: from {{h4423}} and {{h3050}}; (whom) Jah has delivered; Melatjah, a Gibeonite; Melatiah.

h4425.definition: from {{h4448}}number 4449, corrected to 4448b (in the sense of cropping (compare {{h4135}})); a head of grain (as cut off); ear.

h4426.definition: from {{h3887}}; an aphorism; also a satire; interpretation, taunting.

h4427.definition: a primitive root; to reign; inceptively, to ascend the throne; causatively, to induct into royalty; hence (by implication) to take counsel; consult, × indeed, be (make, set a, set up) king, be (make) queen, (begin to, make to) reign(-ing), rule, × surely.

h4429.definition: the same as {{h4428}}; king; Melek, the name of two Israelites; Melech, Hammelech (by including the article).

h4430.definition: (Aramaic) corresponding to {{h4428}}; a king; king, royal.

h4431.definition: (Aramaic) from a root corresponding to {{h4427}} in the sense of consultation; advice; counsel.

h4432.definition: from {{h4427}}; Molek (i.e. king), the chief deity of the Ammonites; Molech. Compare {{h4445}}.

h4435.definition: a form of {{h4436}}; queen; Milcah, the name of a Hebrewess and of an Israelite; Milcah.

h4437.definition: (Aramaic) corresponding to {{h4438}}; dominion (abstractly or concretely); kingdom, kingly, realm, reign.

h4438.definition: or מַלְכֻת; or (in plural) מַלְכֻיָּה; from {{h4427}}; a rule; concretely, a dominion; empire, kingdom, realm, reign, royal.

h4439.definition: from {{h4428}} and {{h410}}; king of (i.e. appointed by) God; Malkiel, an Israelite; Malchiel.

h4440.definition: patronymical from {{h4439}}; a Malkielite or descendant of Malkiel; Malchielite.

h4441.definition: or מַלְכִּיָּהוּlemma מַלְכִּיָהוּ missing dagesh, corrected to מַלְכִּיָּהוּ; (Jeremiah 38:6), from {{h4428}} and {{h3050}}; king of (i.e. appointed by) Jah; Malkijah, the name of ten Israelites; Malchiah, Malchijah.

h4442.definition: from {{h4428}} and {{h6664}}; king of right; Malki-Tsedek, an early king in Palestine; Melchizedek.

h4443.definition: from {{h4428}} and {{h7311}}; king of a high one (i.e. of exaltation); Malkiram, an Israelite; Malchiram.

h4444.definition: from {{h4428}} and {{h7769}}; king of wealth; Malkishua, an Israelite; Malchishua.

h4445.definition: or מִלְכּוֹם; from {{h4428}} for {{h4432}}; Malcam or Milcom, the national idol of the Ammonites; Malcham, Milcom.

h4447.definition: feminine active participle of {{h4427}}; queen; Moleketh, an Israelitess; Hammoleketh (including the article).

h4448.definition: a primitive root; to speak (mostly poetical) or say; say, speak, utter.

h4449.definition: (Aramaic) corresponding to {{h4448}}; to speak; say, speak(-ing).

h4450.definition: from {{h4448}}; talkative; Milalai, an Israelite; Milalai.

h4451.definition: from {{h3925}}; a goad for oxen; goad.

h4452.definition: a primitive root; to be smooth, i.e. (figuratively) pleasant; be sweet.

h4453.definition: of Persian derivation; the butler or other officer in the Babylonian court; Melzar.

h4454.definition: a primitive root; to crack a joint; by implication, to wring the neck of a fowl (without separating it); wring off.

h4455.definition: from {{h3947}}; transitively (in dual) the jaws (as taking food); intransitively, spoil [and captives] (as taken); booty, jaws, prey.

h4456.definition: from {{h3953}}; (compare {{h3954}}); the spring rain; figuratively, eloquence; latter rain.

h4457.definition: or מַלְקָח; from {{h3947}}; (only in dual) tweezers; snuffers, tongs.

h4458.definition: from an unused root meaning to spread out; a wardrobe (i.e. room where clothing is spread); vestry.

h4459.definition: transp. for {{h4973}}; a grinder, i.e. back tooth; great tooth.

h4460.definition: from {{h4048}} (in the sense of depositing); a granary; barn.

h4462.definition: or (transp.) מוֹמֻכָן; (Esther 1:16), of Persian derivation; Memucan or Momucan, a Persian satrap; Memucan.

h4463.definition: from {{h4191}}; a mortal disease; concretely, a corpse; death.

h4464.definition: from an unused root meaning to alienate; a mongrel, i.e. born of a Jewish father and a heathen mother; bastard.

h4465.definition: from {{h4376}}; merchandise; abstractly, a selling; × ought, (that which cometh of) sale, that which...sold, ware.

h4466.definition: feminine of {{h4465}}; a sale; sold as.

h4467.definition: from {{h4427}}; dominion, i.e. (abstractly) the estate (rule) or (concretely) the country (realm); kingdom, king's, reign, royal.

h4468.definition: a form of {{h4467}} and equiv. to it; kingdom, reign.

h4469.definition: from {{h4537}}; mixture, i.e. (specifically) wine mixed (with water or spices); drink-offering, mixed wine.

h4470.definition: from an unused root meaning to grieve; sorrow; bitterness.

h4471.definition: from {{h4754}}(in the sense of vigor); lusty; Mamre, an Amorite; Mamre.

h4472.definition: from {{h4843}}; a bitterness, i.e. (figuratively) calamity; bitterness.

h4473.definition: from {{h4886}}, in the sense of expansion; outspread (i.e. with outstretched wings); anointed.

h4474.definition: from {{h4910}}; a ruler or (abstractly) rule; dominion, that ruled.

h4475.definition: feminine of {{h4474}}; rule; also (concretely in plural) a realm or a ruler; dominion, government, power, to rule.

h4476.definition: from the same as {{h4943}}; a possession; breeding.

h4477.definition: from {{h4985}}; something sweet (literally or figuratively); (most) sweet.

h4478.definition: from {{h4100}}; literally a whatness (so to speak), i.e. manna (so called from the question about it); manna.

h4479.definition: (Aramaic) from {{h4101}}; who or what (properly, interrogatively, hence, also indefinitely and relatively); what, who(-msoever,   -so).

h4480.definition: or מִנִּי; or מִנֵּי; (constructive plural) (Isaiah 30:11); for {{h4482}}; properly, a part of; hence (prepositionally), from or out of in many senses; above, after, among, at, because of, by (reason of), from (among), in, × neither, × nor, (out) of, over, since, × then, through, × whether, with.

h4481.definition: (Aramaic) corresponding to {{h4480}}; according, after,   because,   before, by, for, from, × him, × more than, (out) of, part, since, × these, to, upon,   when.

h4482.definition: from an unused root meaning to apportion; a part; hence, a musical chord (as parted into strings); in [the same] (Psalm 68:23), stringed instrument (Psalm 150:4), whereby (Psalm 45:8 [defective plural]).

h4483.definition: (Aramaic) or מְנָה; (Aramaic), corresponding to {{h4487}}; to count, appoint; number, ordain, set.

h4486.definition: (Aramaic) corresponding to {{h4093}}; wisdom or intelligence; knowledge, reason, understanding.

h4487.definition: a primitive root; properly, to weigh out; by implication, to allot or constitute officially; also to enumerate or enroll; appoint, count, number, prepare, set, tell.

h4488.definition: from {{h4487}}; properly, a fixed weight or measured amount, i.e. (techn.) a maneh or mina; maneh, pound.

h4489.definition: from {{h4487}}; properly, something weighed out, i.e. (figuratively) a portion of time, i.e. an instance; time.

h4490.definition: from {{h4487}}; properly, something weighed out, i.e. (generally) a division; specifically (of food) a ration; also a lot; such things as belonged, part, portion.

h4491.definition: from {{h5090}}; the driving (of a chariot); driving.

h4492.definition: from {{h5102}}; properly, a channel or fissure, i.e. (by implication) a cavern; den.

h4493.definition: from {{h5110}}; a nodding or toss (of the head in derision); shaking.

h4494.definition: from {{h5117}}; quiet, i.e. (concretely) a settled spot, or (figuratively) a home; (place of) rest.

h4495.definition: the same as {{h4494}}; rest; Manoach, an Israelite; Manoah.

h4496.definition: or מְנֻחָה; feminine of {{h4495}}; repose or (adverbially) peacefully; figuratively, consolation (specifically, matrimony); hence (concretely) an abode; comfortable, ease, quiet, rest(-ing place), still.

h4497.definition: from {{h5125}}; a continuator, i.e. heir; son.

h4498.definition: from {{h5127}}; a retreat (literally or figuratively); abstractly, a fleeing; × apace, escape, way to flee, flight, refuge.

h4499.definition: or מְנֻסָה; feminine of {{h4498}}; retreat; fleeing, flight.

h4500.definition: from {{h5214}}; a yoke (properly, for plowing), i.e. the frame of a loom; beam.
